recipesJson.name: Ancient Custard
recipesJson.author: vagdal
recipesJson.description:
Thick smooth vanilla custard covered with a caramelized thin crust.
 
Steeping: It's really tasty as a shake and vape but for better results you should wait 8-10 days.

reviews.text: I mixed this one up, left it steeping for 7 days and its definitely what you said.... vanilla custard covered by a caramelised thin crust but tbh i don't enjoy it  that much as you did which doesn't mean it's not good! but still interesting profile! :-)
